title: The Favorites - Best Bets NFL Week 5
itunes:title: The Favorites - Best Bets NFL Week 5
description:
The NFL slate is unusually exciting to Action Network hosts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter this week, offering a number of strong plays from Thursday to Monday night. Together the guys discuss their fondness for the Ravens and Bucs this week, before resorting to childish name-calling when it comes to an AFC East showdown. Plus we get a Big Balls Bet of the Week, an underdog round robin, and plenty more. #volume #herd #colincowherd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
